overview:
Daniel is Co Founder of Space Station 6 were he works as the head of marketing and PR.

He started as part of the new media strategies team for Colgate-Palmolive testing public perception of products.

In 2006 he launched his first startup, offering marketing research solutions specifically focused on teenagers and college students. After 8 months he joined forces with media and design group Kant & Joules to create Dreamink, allowing them to offer a wider range of digital marketing services.

While at Dreamink Daniel created and managed new media marketing campaigns for companies like Kimberly Clark, The Yellow Pages, and Warner Music.

In 2011 Dreamink merged with Seattle based All Widgets to create Space Station 6, having the vision of creating products that enable people to reconnect with others and their surroundings.

His latest work revolves around SS6 latest product, Dunno.
